questions.question_text: A project manager is procuring new equipment from a vendor. The vendor requires a physical signature on all purchase orders. Which of the following should the project manager do to order the equipment quickly? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: "Due to a lack of adherence to the risk response plan" there was a plan, just wasn't communicated correctly

questions.question_text:
A project manager is unsure if the quality of a deliverable from a SME meets specifications.
Which of the following is the BEST way for the project manager to address the issue?

choices.B: Send an email outlining the concerns to the team member.
choices.A: Conduct a face-to-face or telephone meeting with the team member.
choices.D: Post the issue on the wiki page for input from stakeholders.
choices.C: Send a project team meeting to obtain feedback from everyone.
